channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ajax Search Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ajax Search Lite

item.title: CVE-2023-1420|2023-04-24T18:30:49.881Z -- unknown -- ajax%20search%20lite
item.description: The Ajax Search Lite WordPress plugin before 4.11.1, Ajax Search Pro WordPress plugin before 4.26.2 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in a response of an AJAX action, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
